code: var TOKEN="token";var isLocalStorage=function isLocalStorage(){return localStorage.getItem(TOKEN);};var storeToken=function storeToken(token,rememberMe){if(rememberMe){localStorage.setItem(TOKEN,token);}else{sessionStorage.setItem(TOKEN,token);}};var getToken=function getToken(){var token=isLocalStorage();if(token){return token;}else{return sessionStorage.getItem(TOKEN);}};export{storeToken,getToken};
